description: 2 vols. ff. 458, 343. 207/203 x 153/150; 150 x 90 mm. 23 lin. Jumādá I - Dhū al-Qaʻdah 986. Commentary on Irshād al-ghāwī ilá masālik al-ḥawī (abridgment of al-ḥāwī al-ṣaghīr) of Ibn al-Muqriʻ, d. 873/1433: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 495 (Ausz., commentary 3); S I, 679. Incip.: ... الحمد لله على ما منح من انعامه وفتح من الهامه
author: Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1503-approximately 1566
title: Fatḥ al-jawād bi-sharḥ al-Irshād.
creator: Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1503-approximately 1566
subject: Ibn al-Muqrī, Ismāʻīl ibn Abī Bakr, 1354-1433 or 1434—Irshād al-ghāwī ilá masālik al-ḥawī.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
